  • &hacks Chair

    Wilson Lin

    Wilson Lin is a junior majoring in computer science and economics; he hails from the town of Burke, VA. His chief work-related interests are in software engineering with a dental bent (you'll have to ask him about it). provided that it has nothing to do with raytracing. Outside of this, he enjoys following football and soccer. He is excited to be planning &hacks this year!

  • Special Events Chair

    Felix Iov

    Felix Iov is a Junior majoring in computer science, with interests in physics and math. He is always eager to learn about all the niche quirks that come with software and hardware. For fun, he enjoys biking, playing games, and listening to music.
